parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Type of tolerance as defined in swTolType_e

parameters.name: TolMax
parameters.description: Maximum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMin
parameters.description: Minimum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMaxFit
parameters.description: Text for the maximum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: TolMinFit
parameters.description: Text for the minimum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type<

parameters.name: UseDocPrec
parameters.description: True to use the document's precision value, false to use the value specified for precision

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Precision value to use for this dimension if UseDocPrec is false

parameters.name: ArrowsIn
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use on the first arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: UseDocArrows
parameters.description: True to use the document's arrow types, false to use values specified for Arrow1 and Arrow2

parameters.name: Arrow1
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use on the first arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: Arrow2
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use on the secondarrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: PrefixText
parameters.description: Text for the prefix of the dimension

parameters.name: SuffixText
parameters.description: Text for the suffix of the dimension

parameters.name: ShowValue
parameters.description: True to display the value of the dimension in the user interface, false to not

parameters.name: CalloutText1
parameters.description: Callout text to display above the dimension

parameters.name: CalloutText2
parameters.description: Callout text to display below the dimension

parameters.name: CenterText
parameters.description: True if you want to center the text in the dimension, false if not

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration options as defined swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of configurations

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Names of configurations to which to apply these edits (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Type of tolerance as defined in swTolType_e

parameters.name: TolMax
parameters.description: Maximum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMin
parameters.description: Minimum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMaxFit
parameters.description: Text for the maximum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: TolMinFit
parameters.description: Text for the minimum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type<

parameters.description: True to use the document's precision value, false to use the value specified for precision

parameters.description: Type of arrow to use on the first arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: UseDocArrows
parameters.description: True to use the document's arrow types, false to use values specified for Arrow1 and Arrow2

parameters.name: Arrow1

parameters.name: Arrow2

parameters.name: ConfigOption

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of configurations

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Names of configurations to which to apply these edits (see Remarks )

returns: True if the dimension is modified, false if not
remarks: This method always changes the dimension's parameters in the active configuration. For example, if you specify swSpecifyConfiguration for ConfigOption and do not specify the name of the active configuration in configNames, then the dimension's parameters in the active configuration are still affected.
